main event: Observations of white or green stars flying through the sky on several occasions noted in a report.
interesting points: The sighting occurred in the night, lasting only 1-2 seconds, The observer described something resembling a moon of different colors, Reports of similar sightings in Canton, Ohio, mentioned a light green color, The observer had a long-standing interest in astronomy.
witness description: individual with a long-standing interest in watching the stars
